players.name: Bob
memory: Charlie: "I investigated Bob last night and he's the mafioso!"
Diana: "I think we should verify Charlie's claim. Bob, what's your response?"
Charlie: "Bob is the mafioso—I investigated him last night. His initial silence is suspicious. We must vote him out to protect the town."
Diana: "I believe Charlie's investigation. Bob's silence is very suspicious. We should vote him out."
